readable.title: 2831215155_07ba8f1805
readable.content: An SUV is parked in a grassy field with mountains in the background , and a woman is looking through a telescope off into the distance . A person holding a piece of equipment up to her eyes is standing in a large meadow near a blue vehicle . A person in a field looks through a telescope while a blue car approaches or waits . A woman is looking through binoculars while standing in front of a car that is parked near mountains . A woman stands in a field near a car , and looks through binoculars .
